cue eval t.cue data.cue
cmp stdout stdout-t

# allow stdin to mix package
cue eval kube.cue data.cue
cmp stdout stdout-files

# don't pick up the unnamed package in directory mode
cue eval .
cmp stdout stdout-pkg


# allow stdin to mix package
! cue eval kube.cue foo/kube2.cue

-- data.cue --
foo:3
-- t.cue --
foo: int
bar: 3
-- kube.cue --
package kube

foo: int
bar: 3
-- foo/kube2.cue --
package kube2

foo: int
bar: 3
-- stdout-t --
foo: 3
bar: 3
-- stdout-files --
foo: 3
bar: 3
-- stdout-pkg --
foo: int
bar: 3
